entries.title: ‘Terminator’ Movie Tech: Phase-Shifting Robot Can Switch Between Liquid and Solid States
entries.description: The sea cucumber,  sometimes referred to as the “headless chicken monster,” inspired researchers working on a shift-changing material. (NOAA Office of Ocean Exploration and Research, via AP)

entries.title: ACLU Backs Trump’s Reinstatement on Facebook: ‘This Is the Right Call’
entries.description: Former President Donald Trump speaks at the Mar-a-Lago Club in Palm Beach, Fla., on Nov. 15, 2022. (Alon Skuy/AFP via Getty Images)

entries.title: Intel Shares Plunge on Disappointing Earnings Report, Weak Year Ahead Forecast
entries.description: Computer chip maker Intel's logo is shown on a gaming computer display during the opening day of E3, the annual video games expo revealing the latest in gaming software and hardware in Los Angeles, Calif., on June 11, 2019. (Reuters/Mike Blake/File Photo

entries.title: Testing Group Says Tesla Autopilot Slips in Driver Assistance Ratings
entries.description: A Tesla Model 3 vehicle drives on autopilot along the 405 highway in Westminster, Calif., on March 16, 2022. (Mike Blake/Reuters)
